name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim - Risiko Augmented
name_original: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim - Risiko Augmented
description:
The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim - Risiko Augmented Coming soon!

This is an interface that will improve your gameplay experience of the analog board game The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim - Risiko.

This interface will make all of the annoying analog Player-Stats-Boards obsolete.

You have a structured overview of all of the players current stats and you are provided with a structured set of phases as prompted in the games manual. All of the important numbers and steps that are required for each match will be displayed on the screen for you. Simply display the application on your TV or preferred device and get going!

Currently only available in German.

TESV: Skyrim - Risiko Trademark belong to Bethesda Softworks LLC, a Zenimax Media Company and Hasbro. This is a non-profit project and made for private use only.

The Wallpapers and Images used for some of the backgrounds were found on: https://wallpapersafari.com 
https://wallpaperaccess.com
Foresworn Artwork: https://wall.alphacoders.com/big.php?i=327634 Shared by TorinoGT
